20081865_EA.name: Cold-Extracted Extra Virgin Olive Oil
20081865_EA.description: Our 100% extra virgin olive oil is crafted in Italy from the first pressing of ripe olives. Beyond its fruity, fragrant and mildly peppery charms, it’s flavourful enough for dipping and drizzling, but not so strong that it can’t be used for other purposes like whisking and cooking. Think of this as your hard-working kitchen companion, ready to enhance most any dish imaginable.

20047715_EA.name: 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil
20047715_EA.description: Great for salad dressings, marinades, dipping and drizzling.

20105368_EA.name: Extra Virgin Olive Oil
20105368_EA.description: The trusted name in olive oil

20156182001_EA.name: Rich Taste-Extra Virgin Olive Oil
20156182001_EA.description: This quality blend of extra virgin olive oils is “cold pressed” for a naturally full-bodied fruity flavour. The Rich taste is best enjoyed drizzled over pastas, salads, dressings, dips and bread. Smoke Point  392° F/200° C

20729461_EA.name: Delyssa Premium Extra Virgin Olive Oil
20729461_EA.description: Terra Delyssa first cold press extra virgin olive oil is perfect for all types of cooking. Its smooth and mild flavor is perfect compliment for all dishes including drizzling, dipping, vinaigrettes, marinades, sautéing, light frying, roasting and baking. Terra Delyssa is the essential extra virgin olive oil customers have grown to love and trust in their kitchen for years.Made with 100% Tunisian olives, the quality of Terra Delyssa extra virgin olive oil is controlled from end to end. It is single sourced and all natural, meaning it is not blended with other oils from other countries, or mixed with any additives or preservatives.The result is high quality, versatile, smooth and mild tasting first cold press extra virgin olive oil that’s made just for you.

20000207001_EA.name: Extra Light Taste Olive Oil
20000207001_EA.description: For the benefits of olive oil without the noticeable taste, substitute Bertolli Extra Light Olive Oil for butter, shortening and other vegetable oils. It’s ideal for high-heat cooking like baking, frying and sautéing. Smoke Point: 410° F / 210°C

20141395_EA.name: Extra Virgin Olive Oil Club Size
20141395_EA.description: Keep stocked up on a kitchen staple by adding Extra Virgin Olive Oil Club Size to your pantry. This 100% extra virgin olive oil is great for everyday cooking and frying foods.

20162539_EA.name: Cold-Extracted Extra Virgin Olive Oil
20162539_EA.description: Our 100% extra virgin olive oil is crafted in Italy from the first extracting of ripe olives. Beyond its fruity, fragrant and mildly peppery charms, it’s flavourful enough for dipping and drizzling, but not so strong that it can’t be used for other purposes like whisking, drizzling and cooking. Think of this as your hard-working kitchen companion, ready to enhance most any dish imaginable.

20045250_EA.name: Cold-Pressed Extra Virgin Olive Oil
20045250_EA.description: A kitchen essential, this cold-pressed extra virgin olive oil retains its fruity and subtle flavour during cooking.  Perfect for drizzling on salads, dipping with bread and brushing on bruschetta.

20047915_EA.name: Rich Taste-Extra Virgin Olive Oil
20047915_EA.description: This quality blend of extra virgin olive oils is “cold pressed” for a naturally full-bodied fruity flavour. The Rich taste is best enjoyed drizzled over pastas, salads, dressings, dips and bread. Smoke Point  392° F/200° C

21401612_EA.name: Delicato, Cold Extracted Extra Virgin Olive Oil

20000207002_EA.name: Light Taste Olive Oil
20000207002_EA.description: Bertolli Light Olive Oil is versatile enough to be used in almost every style of cooking. Exquisitely balanced with a gentle hint of olives, bright, golden colour and mild. Complements the true flavour of any meal. Smoke Point: 410° F / 210°C

20156182002_EA.name: Mild Taste-Extra Virgin Olive Oil
20156182002_EA.description: Though initially sweet, its caramel flavour is only the beginning. Then the soft aromas of almonds appear, and the fresh taste of tomatoes and vegetables. And the finale? An extra virgin olive oil with a subtle bitterness, and an aftertaste of simplicity. Pairs well with light dishes like chicken, seafood and vegetables. Smoke Point: 392° F/200° C

20156179_EA.name: Kalamata Extra Virgin Olive Oil
20156179_EA.description: The Messinia and Laconia region of Southern Greece has been producing the first olive oil in the world since the beginning of history. The Lefas family proudly continues the tradition of selecting and producing the finest olive oil in the region for more than 150 years.

21093990_EA.name: Cold-Pressed Extra Virgin Olive Oil Spray

21039665_EA.name: Rich Taste-Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil
21039665_EA.description: This quality blend of extra virgin olive oils is “cold pressed” for a naturally full-bodied fruity flavour. The Rich taste is best enjoyed drizzled over pastas, salads, dressings, dips and bread. Smoke Point  392° F/200° C

20077972_EA.name: Extra Virgin Olive Oil
20077972_EA.description: The finest and fruitiest of the olive oils, good for cardiovascular health while balancing metabolism and body functioning. Good source of vitamin E, and 0% cholesterol.

20840038001_EA.name: Grape Tomato 907G
20840038001_EA.description: Grape tomatoes are small and oval-shaped with a smooth red or yellow skin. They typically have a thicker skin and sweeter flavour than cherry tomatoes. Add raw grape tomatoes to your salads or vegetable platters, or roast with olive oil and serve with goat cheese and crackers.

20326618_EA.name: Roasted Garlic Olive Oil
20326618_EA.description: A blend of olive oil infused with roasted garlic flavour (it’s an extract), this versatile oil is an easy way to add subtle notes of roasted garlic flavour to foods. Use as a dip with bread, drizzle on salads and steak, brush on chicken, stir into mashed potatoes, and use to sauté vegetables and shrimp.

20117370001_EA.name: Mini Carrots
20117370001_EA.description: Baby (or mini) carrots are harvested young and usually very tender and sweet. Because they are already peeled, baby carrots are a quick and easy snack for people of all ages. Enjoy baby carrots on their own, add them to your vegetable platter, or roast them with a little olive oil for an easy side dish.

20074337_EA.name: Olive Oil Tin
20074337_EA.description:
IF IT SAYS GALLO, THE QUALITY IS GUARANTEED!.

Since ancient times, the olive has been the symbol of peace and prosperity in the Mediterranean world. Today, Gallo 100% Pure Olive Oil is still part of a rich tradition of quality. Gallo 100% Pure Olive Oil uses only fine quality olives, pressed in the time-honoured traditional method, creating a superior-flavoured oil that imparts an unique, subtle accent to many foods..

When flavour and quality is most important, you can trust Gallo Pure Olive Oil to be the finest 100% pure olive oil..

GALLO: THE TRUSTED NAME IN OLIVE OIL FOR GENERATIONS

20010855_EA.name: Extra Virgin Olive Oil for Salads & Pesto
20010855_EA.description:
Subtle and light, this oil is made from sun-drenched olives. It adds a gentle flavour to any dish, from soup to desserts, without overwhelming. An everyday oil with taste!

Quebec 1983 Canada

21279389_EA.name: Margarine with Olive Oil
21279389_EA.description:
If you love olive oil, you'll love Becel with Olive Oil. Ideal for cooking, spreading and baking, Becel with Olive Oil is the perfect kitchen partner to help you embrace the spirit of the Mediterranean. Becel can be used as a 1:1 swap for butter in your favourite sweet or savoury dishes.

A healthy diet low in saturated and trans fats may reduce the risk of heart disease. Becel is low in saturated fat and has no trans fat. No artificial preservatives, flavours or colours. Made with plant-based oils.

Lifestyle & Dietary Needs:

  • Kosher
  • Gluten-free
  • No artificial preservatives
  • No trans fat
  • Cholesterol free
  • Low in saturated fat
  • Non-hydrogenated
  • Source of omega-3

20169932_EA.name: Canola & Olive Oil Blend
20169932_EA.description: A mix of extra-virgin olive oil and 100% pure canola oil, this versatile blend offers the ideal way to add subtle olive oil taste plus the high smoke point of canola oil. Great for pan-frying or sautéing, for whisking in salad dressings or using in baking.

20793034001_KG.name: Green Cabbage
20793034001_KG.description: Cabbages are cruciferous vegetables that range in size, shape, and colour. Green cabbage heads have tightly wrapped leaves with a mild, spicy flavour that can be eaten raw or cooked. Shred cabbage for salad or slaw, or cut into wedges and roast with olive oil and lemon.

20315275001_EA.name: Cooking Spray with Olive Oil
20315275001_EA.description: All Natural PAM Olive Oil is an alternative to cooking with olive oil. Spray it on your pasta after cooking or to your favorite pasta dish.

20628744001_EA.name: Mayonnaise Olive Oil
20628744001_EA.description:
• A combination of subtle olive oil with the delicious creamy taste of Hellmann's mayonnaise you love
  • Made with real simple ingredients, like 1% Canadian free run eggs and canola oil from the Prairies
  • Hellmann's with Olive Oil Mayonnaise Type Dressing is the ideal condiment for sandwiches, salads and burgers
  • New Hellmann's squeeze bottle with clean lock cap
  • Made in Canada for over 75 years, this condiment is rich in Omega 3-ALA, Gluten Free, and Kosher
  • Use Hellmann’s with Olive Oil Mayonnaise -Type Dressing as an ingredient to transform your barbecues and everyday chicken dinners into juicier, more delicious meals

21397367_EA.name: Roasted Olive Oil
21397367_EA.description:
All the flavour without the fuss. Our Ben's Original Natural Select with Garlic, Olive Oil Flavour & Wild rice is the perfect side dish for your weeknight dinner. Ready in 15 minutes, pair this natural & flavourful rice with your favourite vegetables & protein for an easy-to-make and complete meal. For your next dinner recipe, try some of our other flavoured rice items like Natural Select Garlic & Butter Flavour Rice or Natural Select Roasted Chicken Flavour & Wild Rice.
  • Ready in 15 minutes
  • No Artificial Flavours or Preservatives

21279391_EA.name: Margarine with Olive Oil
21279391_EA.description:
If you love olive oil, you'll love Becel with Olive Oil. Ideal for cooking, spreading and baking, Becel with Olive Oil is the perfect kitchen partner to help you embrace the spirit of the Mediterranean. Becel can be used as a 1:1 swap for butter in your favourite sweet or savoury dishes.

A healthy diet low in saturated and trans fats may reduce the risk of heart disease. Becel is low in saturated fat and has no trans fat. No artificial preservatives, flavours or colours. Made with plant-based oils.

20784324_EA.name: Olive Oil Ear Spray
20784324_EA.description: A method for dispensing olive oil into the outer ear to soften compacted earwax.
